entry.def: A concertina is a musical instrument consisting of two end pieces with stiff paper or cloth that folds up between them. You play the concertina by pressing the buttons on the end pieces while moving them together and apart.

means.word_mean: 1. coiled barbed wire used as an obstacle
2. free-reed instrument played like an accordion by pushing its ends together to force air through the reeds
